head.title: Coronavirus Information - Highland School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Highland Junior High School
Go to Marcus Whitman Cowiche Elementary School

li.a: Facilities Use Request Forms & Fee Structure
Non Discrimination and Sexual Harassment Info
Student In/Out of District & Homeschool Forms

br.span: For those students experiencing technology related issues while working from home, we will be opening technology services access on Thursdays. It will coincide with the Child Nutrition meal kit distribution. In an effort to not disrupt the food distribution we will again be using room 164 in the Junior High. We will open an outside door and be able to exchange laptops to help minimize any disruptions to families. Thank you for your patience as work through these issues. HSD Technology Department.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; text-decoration-line: underline; display: inline; float: none; font-style: italic; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(99, 36, 35);

em.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; color: rgb(74, 74, 74); font-family: OpenSans-Light; text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: "Segoe UI", sans-serif; font-size: 24px; color: black;

span.span: In an effort to slow the spread of COVID-19, Governor Inslee has made the decision to close school for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Click here for a message from Superintendent Mark Anderson.

br.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; color: rgb(74, 74, 74); font-family: OpenSans-SemiBold; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: italic; text-align: center;

font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; text-decoration-line: underline; font-size: x-large; font-style: italic; text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(99, 36, 35);

br.span: **Actualización (Nueva información) sobre la cancelación de clases en el distrito de Highland**

br.em: En un esfuerzo para frenar la propagación de COVID-19, el Gobernador Inslee ha tomado la decisión de cerrar la escuela por el resto del año escolar 2019-2020. Clic aquí para acesar un mensaje del Superintendente Mark Anderson.

br.span:
The Highland School District Office is closed to the public until further notice.
La oficina de el distrito de Highland esta cerrado hasta nuevo aviso.

br.a: Click here for 'Meal Kit/Contenido del kit de comidas' weekly grocery list.

a.title: Week 1 Grocery List/Lista de Alimentos, Semana 1

span.style: font-size: x-large; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(79, 97, 40);

br.span: HSD is gathering information regarding the childcare needs of Highland School District families with a parent that is a First Responder or Medical Services Provider. Please click here to access survey information.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(79, 97, 40);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(79, 97, 40);

br.span:
Currently building principals and teachers are working together to gather educational resources. Please visit the webpage of your student's school(s) for specific information about educational resources.
​
Novel Coronavirus Information
The best sources of information are:
Las mejores fuentes de información sobre el coronavirus son (se actualizan diariamente y tienen opciones de traducción al español):
Washington State Department of Health (DOH) Novel Coronavirus webpage
Washington State Department of Health (DOH)-Facebook page
Centers for Disease Control
Centers for Disease Control-Facebook page
Yakima County-Office of Emergency Management-Facebook page
Yakima Health District-Facebook page
Coronavirus.wa.gov
These sites are updated regularly.

a.title: How Can I be Prepared for a COVID-19 Outbreak? in English and Spanish.

a.title: ¿Como prepararse para un brote de COVID-19?

p.span: The key message is to keep calm and stop the spread of germs.

span.span: Please click on the links below for respiratory hygiene guidelines.
